title: lib/codereview: cannot find CL in local repository
body:
Cannot undo existing CL, but should be able to:

# hg id
87dcbcc9371b tip
# hg st
# hg log -r 4eda5e4001fd -v
changeset:   21122:4eda5e4001fd
user:        Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
date:        Mon Sep 08 17:47:12 2014 -0700
files:       src/syscall/mksyscall_windows.go src/syscall/zsyscall_windows.go
description:
syscall: keep Windows syscall pointers live too

Like https://golang.org/cl/139360044

LGTM=rsc, alex.brainman
R=alex.brainman, rsc
CC=golang-codereviews
https://golang.org/cl/138250043


# hg undo 138250043
abort: cannot find CL 138250043 in local repository
#

I can see where the problem is, but not confident enough to change codereview.

Alex
